name: hexgrid-map
description: Data studio visualization for a hexgrid map

scripts.clean: rm -f main.js; rm -f bundle.js; rm -f maps.js; rm -f maps/*.geojson
scripts.map:
echo "// Global definition
var maps = {};" > maps.js && for file in maps/*.geojson; do city=$(echo "$file" | cut -d'/' -f 2 | cut -d'.' -f 1) && (echo "maps['$city'] = "; cat "$file"; echo) >> maps.js; done && echo "Map finished!"
scripts.prebuild: (cat node_modules/@google/dscc/_bundles/dscc.min.js; echo) > bundle.js && for f in simple-statistics d3-hexgrid d3; do (cat "node_modules/${f}/dist/${f}.min.js"; echo) >> bundle.js; done && echo "Prebuild finished!"
scripts.build: (cat bundle.js; echo; cat maps.js; echo; cat src/hexgrid-map.js) > main.js && echo "Build finished!"
scripts.upload: gsutil cp -a public-read src/* $npm_package_config_gcsLocation && gsutil cp -a public-read main.js $npm_package_config_gcsLocation && gsutil cp -a public-read src/manifest.json $npm_package_config_gcsLocation

author: Ariel Perez
